revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Check Point |model=V-80 |revision=Rev: 1.03 |asin=B08QMJYRGC |newegg=9SIAGBAHNW2554 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |pcb_id=00EB557-00-103-RS |type=network security platform |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F7040 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kioxia |fla1_model=THGBMNG5D1LBAIL |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5AD512M8D3-HR |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CN3 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6352 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=USB-to-UART Bridge Controller;Silicon Labs;CP2102N;;1;,,, I2C Serial Real Time Clock;Maxim Integrated;DS1337;;1;,,, 10A, 18V Synchronous Step-Down Controller;MPS;MPQ8636;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;2;,,, High Current Synchronous Buck Converter;ON Semi;NCP3235;;1;,,, 3A LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9018A;;1;,,, 2-Wire 4K Bit Serial EEPROM;Giantec Semi;GT24C04A;;1;, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, heatsink, power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;2018.03;release-19.06.3; |stock_os=Linux;4.14.76;Check Point RD-6281-A |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:1C:7F }} {{TagLine|Security Gateway}} :[https://www.checkpoint.com/downloads/products/1500-security-gateway-datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
"00EB557-00-103-RS", "Check Point V-80", and "Rev:1.03" are silk-screened on the board top.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F7040 @1.4GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) *Storage: 4GB eMMC Flash *Memory: 2GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Network: 6x GbE (WAN/LAN) ports *PCI: 1x mini-PCIe port *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: 12V/3.3A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Check Point V-80 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point V-80 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Check Point V-80 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
